rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Dr. B is by far my favorite professor I've ever had at UNC. He draws on his past experiences to provide real world examples and is very hands-on. He truly wants his students to succeed. If you ever have the chance to take a course taught by Dr. B, I would highly recommend doing so.

Excellent professor. Very enjoyable lectures. Dr B draws on his practical experience to make lecture topics more interesting by relating anecdotes, training tips, etc. One of the best classes I've taken in my (very long) college career.
Dr. B is one of the best professors I have had at UNC!

Wonderful professor, and very helpful! Class is enjoyable and Dr. B provides excellent examples that keeps the subject matter even more interesting. Tests are not too difficult if you put in the time studying. Making A is definitely possible!! He wants his students so succeed.
